item.text: With regard to the collection for the saints, please follow the directions that I gave to the churches of Galatia:

<st data-num="2596" class="">On</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">first</st> <st data-num="4521" class="">day of the week</st>, <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> should <st data-num="5087" class="">set aside</st> some income<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="2343" class="">save</st><n id="2" /> it to the extent <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> God has <st data-num="2137" class="">blessed</st> you,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> a <st data-num="3048" class="">collection</st> will <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> have to be <st data-num="1096" class="">made</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st>, <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> I <st data-num="3854" class="">arrive</st>, I will <st data-num="3992" class="">send</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">those</st> whom you <st data-num="1381" class="">approve</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1992" class="">letters</st> of explanation to <st data-num="667" class="">carry</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="1" />
And if it seems advisable that I should go also, they will go with me.
But I will come to you after I have gone through Macedonia—for I will be going through Macedonia—

and perhaps I will <st data-num="2650" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2532">even</st> <st data-num="3914">spend the winter</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> can <st data-num="4311" class="">send</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4311" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="4311" class="">journey</st>, <st data-num="3757 1437">wherever</st> I <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="737" class="">now</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3938" class="">passing</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">since</st> I <st data-num="1679" class="">hope</st> to <st data-num="1961" class="">spend</st> <st data-num="5100">some</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">time</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2010" class="">allows</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I will <st data-num="1961" class="">stay</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2181" class="">Ephesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> <st data-num="4005" class="">Pentecost</st>,
because a door of great opportunity stands wide open for me, but there are many opponents.
Now if Timothy comes, see that he has nothing to fear among you, for he is doing the Lord’s work, as I am too.
So then, let no one treat him with contempt. But send him on his way in peace so that he may come to me. For I am expecting him with the brothers.
With regard to our brother Apollos: I strongly encouraged him to visit you with the other brothers, but it was simply not his intention to come now. He will come when he has the opportunity.
Stay alert, stand firm in the faith, show courage, be strong.
Everything you do should be done in love.
Now, brothers and sisters, you know about the household of Stephanus, that as the first converts of Achaia, they devoted themselves to ministry for the saints. I urge you

<st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5293" class="">submit</st> to <st data-num="5108">people like this</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="4903">cooperates in the work</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2872">labors hard</st>.

I was <st data-num="5463" class="">glad</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="3952" class="">arrival</st> of <st data-num="4734" class="">Stephanus</st>, <st data-num="5415" class="">Fortunatus</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="883" class="">Achaicus</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they have <st data-num="378" class="">supplied</st> the fellowship with <st data-num="5212" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="5303" class="">lacked</st>.<n id="1" />
For they refreshed my spirit and yours. So then, recognize people like this.
The churches in the province of Asia send greetings to you. Aquila and Prisca greet you warmly in the Lord, with the church that meets in their house.
All the brothers and sisters send greetings. Greet one another with a holy kiss.
I, Paul, send this greeting with my own hand.
Let anyone who has no love for the Lord be accursed. Our Lord, come!
The grace of the Lord Jesus be with you.
My love be with all of you in Christ Jesus.
